summary: New Worldspace/Quest Adventure in the form of a new realm of oblivion
descriptionHtml:
THE PIT OF SORROW

The Pit of Sorrow, the forgotten 17th plane of Oblivion which is ruled by Nemesis, the Daedra Prince of Damnation. Nemesis is the oldest and most powerful of the Daedra princes. Fearing his power the other Daedra Princes have kept Nemesis and The Dark Ones Trapped in their realm and all knowledge of them was striken from history.

This mod adds a new quite vast worldspace called the Pit of Sorrow for you to explore. It is fully cluttered, populated and Navmeshed. As of now it only has one lengthy main quest(I hope to add a lot more in future updates).

To start the quest investigate the Forgotten Old Shack near Embershard Mine(Map Marker Visible)


IMPORTANT!!!!!! IN ORDER FOR THE CUSTOM GRASS TO WORK PROPERLY:

OPEN UP BOTH Skyrim.ini and SkyrimPrefs.ini AND AT THE BOTTOM OF THE [Grass] SECTION ADD/ALTER THIS:

bAllowLoadGrass=0
bAllowCreateGrass=1
bDrawShaderGrass=1

(This is a known Bethesda bug and currently this is the only fix)


FEATURES

1 Main Questline
Unique Climate
New enemies
Unique combat/exploration music
New weapons and armor
small bik movies
Voice acting

V1.2

Fixed Object LOD
Fixed missing Coldharbour Armor textures
Fixed Pain Attronach Armor normal maps
Improved Razak-Val
Added new enemies, weapons, armor
Added 2 new quests (3 in total)
Added purchasable player home
Removed havok settle from chest key in mysterious shack to stop it falling through furniture
Added trigger box to remove all Pit of Sorrow music upon re-entering SKyrim

REQUIREMENTS: Dawnguard & Latest Skyrim Update

Mod cleaned with TES5EDIT


INSTALLATION

Unrar, Copy and paste everything to the data folder, check PitofSorrow.esm and POS.esp in Skyrim Data Files and your good to go!
